text: Solitair Brickell is a high-rise under construction in the Brickell district of Miami, Florida, USA. It will contain 420 apartments and be about high with 48 floors when completed in 2017. The building was built in the place of a ramp to a parking garage to an adjacent 1980s office building known as the Brickell Bayview Center during a wave of high-rise residential development in the Greater Downtown Miami area in the 2010s. The building is adjacent to Brickell City Centre, a large mixed-use development completed in 2016. ==See also== * List of tallest buildings in Miami ==References== ==External links== Category:Florida building and structure stubs Category:Residential skyscrapers in Miami
title: Solitair Brickell
